title: A Voyage round Great Britain; with short views of Aberdeen, Balmoral, ... Fécamp, Havre and Paris
author: Hargreaves, Thomas
snippet: Patronising the latter company, I started acrossthe ferry at 4.20 P.M. on my way to Stirling. Changing trains at Larbert, I duly arrived in Stirlingat 5.15, and took up my quarters at the Star Hotel. The captain and I parted company at the Larbertstation, he going on to Glasgow, and from thence toIrvine.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
